subtitle: Rich chocolate creams flavoured with a hint of orange liqueur and baked until just set.

method.text: Gently heat the cream, Cointreau and chocolate together in a pan for 3-5 min, stirring gently until the mixture has melted and become smooth. Remove from heat.
Lightly mix together the egg yolks, whole egg and caster sugar. Stir in the melted chocolate cream. Strain the mixture into individual ovenproof ramekin dishes.
Stand the pots in a roasting tin. Pour in enough boiling water to come half way up the sides of the pots. Bake for 30-35 min or until the custards are almost set.
Cover the pots with cling film. Chill for at least 1 days.
To serve, scatter over orange rind and chocolate curls.

title: Baked chocolate custards
